function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased percentage of respondents hearing neighbour noise during lockdown","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being and quality of life","Mitigation":"Implement soundproofing measures, establish noise reduction guidelines","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise barriers, acoustic panels","People":"Resident, tenants, occupants","Owner":"Property management, homeowners associations, local authorities"},{"Description":"Statistically significant increase in mean annoyance ratings for certain noise sources during lockdown","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and emotional well-being","Mitigation":"Educate residents on coping strategies, establish noise management policies","Technologies":"Noise cancellation devices, white noise machines, community noise monitoring systems","People":"Resident, tenants, occupants","Owner":"Property management, homeowners associations, local authorities"},{"Description":"Comparison of neighbour noise annoyance ratings across dwelling types","Impact":"Potential for unequal distribution of noise impact on residents","Mitigation":"Equalize noise mitigation efforts across all dwelling types, conduct noise impact assessments for different dwelling types","Technologies":"Sound measurement devices, noise mapping software","People":"Resident, tenants, occupants","Owner":"Property management, homeowners associations, local authorities"}]}
